name: Kapacitanco!
description:
Welcome to Kapacitanco – the place where everything is stored!

You, a typical human being from Earth, wake up in a strange world full of oversized furniture and piles of random items. You meet Kesto the Magical Bottomless Chest, your guide in this mysterious place. Explore the world and help Kesto with uncovering the mystery of Kapacitanco!

Features
  • 25-30 minutes of gameplay
  • Inventory tetris minigame with deckbuilding elements
  • Two charismatic chest companions with custom portraits
  • Visual novel style dialogues
  • Intriguing world to explore
  • Nameable protagonist
  • Custom soundtrack
Authors
  • Aleksander Garlikowski – lead designer
  • Aleksandra Piekarzewicz (Jungliana) – art director
Credits
  • Made with Unreal Engine 5
  • Cyberpunk sci-fi crate by MagicGames
  • Low Poly Storage Assets by TheTeaGuns
  • Rocks (Natural 3D Low-Poly Props) by Almighty Assets
  • Low Poly Goat by snippysnappets
  • Music composed by AIVA - Artificial Intelligence Virtual Artist
Known issues

The game runs on Unreal Engine 5 and is barely optimized. Despite the low-poly aesthetics, it requires a decent PC to handle. Also, some specific items can sporadically fall through the floor in the minigame.
